name: Weatharr Station
description: Start a local WeatherStream broadcast and publish it as a channel.

fields.label: Defaults
fields.description: These defaults apply to all stations.

fields.label: Default Frames Per Second
fields.help_text: Default output frame rate (1–60).

fields.label: Default Resolution
fields.help_text: Default output resolution for WeatherStream feeds.

fields.label: Default Video Bitrate (kbps)
fields.help_text: Default target video bitrate in kbps.

fields.label: Default RSS/Atom Feeds
fields.help_text: Default feed URLs, separated by commas (you can also paste with newlines/semicolons).

fields.label: Default RSS Refresh (seconds)
fields.help_text: Default RSS refresh interval. Default 300.

fields.label: Default Max Items Per Feed
fields.help_text: Default titles per feed. Default 3.

fields.label: Station 1
fields.description: Configure a WeatherStream station and channel.

fields.label: Enable Station 1
fields.help_text: Enable this station when starting the plugin.

fields.label: ZIP Code
fields.help_text: 5-digit ZIP used to localize the weather feed

fields.label: Time Zone
fields.help_text: Optional IANA time zone (e.g., 'America/Chicago'). Leave blank to auto-detect from ZIP (WeatherStream will attempt this).

fields.label: Location Name
fields.help_text: Optional display name (e.g., 'Salt Lake City, UT'). If blank, we’ll resolve from ZIP.

fields.label: Channel Number
fields.help_text: Optional channel number in the Weather group. If already taken there, the plugin will refuse to start.
